# appTransactionId

**Type**

The unique identifier of the app download transaction.

## Declaration

```swift
string appTransactionId
```

## Discussion

To get app transaction information, call [doc://com.apple.appstoreserverapi/documentation/AppStoreServerAPI/Get-App-Transaction-Info] and provide the `appTransactionId`.

For more information, see [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/StoreKit/AppTransaction/appTransactionID].
title: appTransactionId
